COMMON.title: CORONAVIRUS RISK
COMMON.langChooseQuestion: Hello, Please tell us which language you'd like to take this test in:
COMMON.Appintro: Hi! Our coronavirus disease self assessment scan has been developed on the basis of guidelines from the WHO and MHFW, Government of India. This interaction should not be taken as expert medical advice. Any information you share with us will be kept strictly confidential.
COMMON.temperatureQuery: Please let us know your current body temperature in degree Fahrenheit (Normal body temperature is 98.6°F):
COMMON.SymptomsQuery: Are you experiencing any of the symptoms below (mark all those applicable)

SymptomsOptions.loss or dim: Loss or Diminished Sense of Smell

COMMON.MoreSymptomsQuery: Additionally, please verify if you are experiencing any of the symptoms below (mark all those applicable):

MoreSymptomsOptions.Persistant: Persistant Pain and Pressure in Chest

COMMON.SmokeQuery: We would like to know about your smoking history
COMMON.TravelQuery: Please select your travel and exposure details

TravelOptions.No contact: No contact with anyone with Symptoms
TravelOptions.History of travel: History of travel or meeting in affected geographical area in last 14 days
TravelOptions.Close contact: Close contact with a person with Fever and cough in last 14 days

COMMON.DiseaseQuery: Do you have a history of any of these conditions (mark all those applicable)
COMMON.SymptomsCheck: How have your symptoms progressed over the last 48 hrs?
